name: Repentance (Lawnmowerman725)
description:
REPENTANCE is a game made for the RIT Game Dev Club's Halloween 2021 Game Jam.

In REPENTANCE, your soul must escape the pits of Heck - however, one false step could land you back at the very beginning!

Luckily, the Devil himself will cut you a deal - in exchange for one of your abilities, you can activate a checkpoint to prevent an extreme loss of progress. Lucky you...(?)

Can your soul escape Heck in one piece?
